Title: Dragonchasers
Plot: Mackey helps Connie quit using crack cold-turkey in her desperate attempt to keep her son, leaving Vendrell and Lemansky to investigate a strip-club mugging ring. Meanwhile, Dutch follows his instincts on a serial killer case and Danny is bitten by an HIV-infected perpetrator.
GuestStars: Sandra Purpuro, Michael Kelly, Nichole Hiltz, Frank Grillo, Jamie Brown
